values: 提供；提出；给予；提议；自愿给；表示愿意（做某事）；出（价）；开（价）；准备好；谈论；（向神）贡献；奉献；赞美；祈祷；出现（机会等）
提议；提供；供给；报价；出价；（商店的短期）减价；销价；低价特供；特价
（OFFER）（英国）电力管制办公室（Office of Electricity Regulation的缩写）

sample.mean: v. 得罪；冒犯；犯罪；令人不快；违反
n. 违法；犯规；犯罪；恼怒；怨恨；进攻
n. 办公室；官职；公职；好事；每日的祈祷；任务；作用；祈祷；储藏室；办事处

sample.mean: v. 授予；商议；协商；讨论；交流意见
v. 不同；相异；意见不同
v. 扰乱；干扰；参与；涉入；插手；干涉；进行性骚扰；光或其他电磁波）相互作用；相互干扰；碰踝；绊脚

word_mean_info__list.difference: 既可指提出意见建议等，又可指拿出某物供人欣赏或赠送。
与offer同义，侧重出于自愿，而不是寿命做某事。
指直接而主动地提出问题或建议等，也指在讨论或争辨中提出具体意见或建议。
最普通用词，多指主动提出或提供意见或东西等，但是否接受由对方自行决定。

word_group.brief_definition: 提供的, 可买到, 可使用
(房屋或其他建筑物)已有买主出价, 在洽售中
伸出手(以便同别人握手)

bilingual.source: We can offer you great summer English courses.
bilingual.target: 我们可以为你提供很棒的暑期英语课程。

bilingual.source: In our restaurant, we offer Western dinners and desserts.
bilingual.target: 在我们餐厅，我们提供西餐和甜点。

bilingual.source: "Thinking about other people's situations inspired me to offer help."
bilingual.target: “想到别人的处境激励我提供帮助。”

bilingual.source: Many countries offer family hotlines to give advice about family relationships.
bilingual.target: 许多国家提供家庭热线来提供家庭关系建议。

bilingual.source: The stores in the Chinatown offer a unique range of souvenirs.
bilingual.target: 唐人街的商店提供独特的纪念品。

bilingual.source: The new shopping mall would offer the choice that they require.
bilingual.target: 新的购物中心将提供他们需要的选择。

bilingual.source: Zoos cannot offer animals an environment that's similar to their natural one.
bilingual.target: 动物园无法为动物提供类似于它们自然环境的环境。

bilingual.source: To help them do this, some senior high schools offer courses in time management.
bilingual.target: 为了帮助他们做到这一点，一些高中提供时间管理课程。
许多互联网服务提供商现在提供光纤连接。

list.abstract: offer，英文单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作名词时意为“提议；出价；意图；录取通知书”，作及物动词时意为“提供；出价；试图”，作不及物动词时意为“提议；出现；献祭；求婚”。
offer，全称是offer letter，汉语解释为录用信、录取通知，还没一个统一的名字，有人称之为“录取通知”，有人谓之“录用信”，也有人称为“邀约函”。 求职信用于正式向求职者提供职位，并提供重要信息，包括开始日期，薪酬，工作时间和职位。他们也被称为就业机会信。

yingyinNormal.en: I offer counsel. The Khan's decisions are his own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只提供建议，大汗会自己做出决定。

yingyinNormal.en: Across our portfolio of over 650 beverages, we now offer a 180 low and no calorie choice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对我们提供的650样饮料中，我们现在提供了180种低或无卡路里饮料作为选择。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

yingyinNormal.en: How many rocks up there in the universe offer 6 billion workers?
yingyinNormal.zh: 宇宙里有多少星球能提供六十亿劳动力？

yingyinNormal.en: Yet, you were here to offer him an alibi? I was here on legal business.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你在这里给他提供了不在场证明？我是来处理法律事务的。

yingyinNormal.en: You play half the game I know you're capable of. He's prepared to offer you a full scholarship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你花五成实力就足够了，他愿意给你提供全额奖学金。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, wait, why does it say one-day rush? Since when do we offer a one-day rush?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，为什么他要一天内加急交货？我们什么时候提供加急服务了？

yingyinNormal.en: The offer still stands. I know a, lovely little redhead that's just dying to be you for the day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还是会给你提供帮助的，一个红发女郎真想替你考试。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm afraid the most exciting thing we can offer is a piece of my homemade chocolate cake.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想我们能提供最令人激动的东西，就是我自制的巧克力蛋糕啦！

yingyinNormal.en: No. I'll ask the press to leave me be. I can't force them to, but we won't offer any logistical support.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我会叫媒体不要报导。我不能强迫他们，但我们不会提供后勤支持。

yingyinNormal.en: But he seemed kinda nice because he did offer you a job. Are you gonna call him? No. No. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是他看起来人还不错，还给你提供工作。你会给他打电话吗？不，不，好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: It does not grant citizenship, or the right to stay here permanently or offer the same benefits that citizens receive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它不涉及授予国籍，给予永久在此的权力，或者提供正式公民拥有的相同的福利。

yingyinNormal.en: They couldn't offer me a full scholarship. So, I didn't have enough money for the tuition. That's awful. Not really. Not sure if I really wanted to go there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是他们不能给我提供全额奖学金，我没有足够的钱交学费。太糟糕了。也不算太糟糕，我不确定是不是真的想去。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I can't be a public witness myself but if you offer me anonymity and immunity, I can testify privately. Tell the committee where the bodies are buried, so to speak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我自己不能做公开证人。但你要是能给我提供匿名权和豁免权我可以私下作证告诉委员会"尸体"埋在哪了。

yingyinNormal.en: We are prepared to offer…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们准备进贡…

yingyinNormal.en: I got a job offer. Yeah? Where?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我收到一个工作邀请是吗？哪里？

yingyinNormal.en: Did you offer him a hot beverage? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你给他上热饮了吗？没。

yingyinNormal.en: And about an hour ago, we made an offer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大约一小时以前，我们开出了我们的价码。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, then, I might as well offer to stay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我也表示一下“留下”的意思好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I was going to offer you my apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我本来打算找你来我家住。

yingyinNormal.en: What can I offer you instead of her? Nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了她，我还能给你什么？没了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 提供(物或机会); 给予(物或机会)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 赠品；捐赠物品；祭品；贡品；产品；捐助；捐赠物

sense_info_list.zh: 提供(物或机会); 给予(物或机会)

examination_example.sentence: They have job <highlight>offers</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们有工作机会。

examination_example.sentence: Buddhist priests <highlight>offer</highlight> a short sermon and recite prayers of blessing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 佛教僧侣进行简短的布道并吟诵祈福祷文。

examination_example.sentence: Advertisers are obliged to <highlight>offer</highlight> behavioural ads.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 广告商有义务提供行为广告。

sense_info_list.en: a reduction in the usual price of something, usually for a short period
present as an act of word

v. 扰乱；干扰；参与；涉入；插手；干涉；进行性骚扰；光或其他电磁波）相互作用；相互干扰；碰踝；绊脚

word_usage.usage:
表示“提供，供应"
offer指主动提供帮助，对方可以接受也可以拒绝。
afford多指提供抽象的东西，可后接双宾语。
furnish可指提供抽象和具体的东西。
provide指为某人提供需要或有用的东西。
supply尤指长时间地定期供应所需或想要之物。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 给与; 主动提供(帮助/恩惠)
减价; 处理价; 特价

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: present in order to satisfy a requirement
sense_info_list.zh: 给与; 主动提供(帮助/恩惠)

examination_example.sentence: Employees will be <highlight>offered</highlight> a career that is even more fulfilling and more rewarding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 员工将获得更令人满足、更有回报的职业。

examination_example.sentence: But when everyone has perfect information, traffic jams simply spread onto the side roads that seem to <highlight>offer</highlight> a way round them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，当每个人都有完美的信息时，交通堵塞就会蔓延到似乎提供了一条绕过它们的路的辅道上。

examination_example.sentence: It seems to <highlight>offer</highlight> autonomy for everyone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它似乎对每个人给予了自主权。

sense_info_list.en: a reduction in the usual price of something, usually for a short period
sense_info_list.zh: 减价; 处理价; 特价

sample.mean: v. 得罪；冒犯；犯罪；令人不快；违反

sample.mean: v. 授予；商议；协商；讨论；交流意见
v. 不同；相异；意见不同
v. 扰乱；干扰；参与；涉入；插手；干涉；进行性骚扰；光或其他电磁波）相互作用；相互干扰；碰踝；绊脚
v. 更喜爱；宁可；偏爱；提出；举报；提拔；提升
v. 提到；谈到；指；提交…做出决定；进行处理；把…归因于；淘汰；参考；查阅；让…注意
v. 经受；使遭受；忍受；允许；患病；容许；变差；变糟；准许；受病痛折磨
v. 转移；转乘；转搭；转让；移交；转变；调动；改行

word_usage.usage:
offer后一般不接that从句。如：
她主动把自行车借给了我。
误 She offered that she would lend me her bike.
正 She offered to lend me her bike.

offer本身已含有“给予，付出”的意思，所以不与give同用。如：
承你的帮忙，不胜感激。
误 We are grateful to you for your offer to give help to us.
正 We are grateful to you for your offer of help to us.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 给与; 主动提供(帮助/恩惠)
减价; 处理价; 特价

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 赠品；捐赠物品；祭品；贡品；产品；捐助；捐赠物

sense_info_list.en: present in order to satisfy a requirement
sense_info_list.zh: 给与; 主动提供(帮助/恩惠)

examination_example.sentence: Cultures without numbers also <highlight>offer</highlight> insight into the cognitive influence of particular numeric traditions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有数字的文化也提供了对特定数字传统认知影响的洞察。

examination_example.sentence: For decades, activists have called for schools to <highlight>offer</highlight> anti-racism or multicultural curricula.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几十年来，积极分子一直呼吁学校提供反种族主义或多元文化课程。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't <highlight>offer</highlight> coffee.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不提供咖啡。

examination_example.sentence: In our pursuit of the good life, he says, it is important to seek out true pleasures-advice which was originally <highlight>offered</highlight> by Epicurus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，在我们追求美好生活的过程中，寻找真正的快乐是很重要的，这是伊壁鸠鲁最初的提议。

examination_example.sentence: The nice thing about ancient philosophy as <highlight>offered</highlight> by the Greeks is that they tended to see life clear and whole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 希腊人提议的古代哲学的好处是，他们倾向于清晰而完整地看待生活。

sense_info_list.en: a reduction in the usual price of something; usually for a short period
sense_info_list.zh: 减价; 处理价; 特价

offer本身已含有“给予，付出”的意思，所以不与give同用。如：

offer后一般不接that从句。如：
她主动把自行车借给了我。
误 She offered that she would lend me her bike.
正 She offered to lend me her bike.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 出(价); 出价; 报价

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: By the time he graduated, he had been <highlight>offered</highlight> jobs by a dozen computer companies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到他毕业时，已经有十几家计算机公司向他提供了工作。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>offers</highlight> beautiful furnishings and beds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它提供漂亮的家具和床。

examination_example.sentence: It is our hope that advances in science will <highlight>offer</highlight> new perspectives (视角) from which to study how people manage their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望科学的进步将提供新的视角以此来研究人们如何管理自己的生活。

examination_example.sentence: What does Daniel <highlight>offer</highlight> to do for Nancy?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 丹尼尔提议为南希做什么？

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>offered</highlight> to fix bikes free of charge for anyone who needed it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他提出为任何需要的人免费修理自行车。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>offered</highlight> to give Sharon a ride home, but she declined, saying that she felt like walking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们提议开车送莎伦回家，但她谢绝了，说她想走路。

examination_example.sentence: Decline the job <highlight>offer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拒绝工作邀请。

examination_example.sentence: A job <highlight>offer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一份工作邀请。

examination_example.sentence: He posted his <highlight>offer</highlight> on a social networking website.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在一个社交网站上发布了他的提议。

sense_info_list.zh: 出(价); 出价; 报价

v. 不同；相异；意见不同
v. 扰乱；干扰；参与；涉入；插手；干涉；进行性骚扰；光或其他电磁波）相互作用；相互干扰；碰踝；绊脚

word_usage.usage:
跟双宾语：
We offered him our congratulations for his passing the entrance examination.
我们因他通过了入学考试而向他祝贺。

跟不定式，表示愿意做某事：
He offered to help me with English.
他主动提出帮我学英语。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 给与; 主动提供(帮助/恩惠)
减价; 处理价; 特价

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 赠品；捐赠物品；祭品；贡品；产品；捐助；捐赠物

sense_info_list.en: present in order to satisfy a requirement
sense_info_list.zh: 给与; 主动提供(帮助/恩惠)

examination_example.sentence: If we do our best for nature, nature will <highlight>offer</highlight> its best to us in return!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们为大自然竭尽所能，大自然会给我们最好的回报！

examination_example.sentence: Lin's eyes moved down the notice board that listed all the courses on <highlight>offer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 林的目光顺着告示牌往下看，上面列出了所有提供的课程。

examination_example.sentence: But shop owners in the north hardly <highlight>offer</highlight> such service.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但北方的店主几乎不提供这种服务。

examination_example.sentence: The board liked the idea but said it could <highlight>offer</highlight> just $ 25, 000—one-fifth of the cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 董事会喜欢这个想法，但表示它只能出价25000美元，即成本价的五分之一。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>offered</highlight> 23 pounds for me, but they refused.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他出价23英镑买我，但他们拒绝了。

examination_example.sentence: Once a person ever <highlight>offered</highlight> four francs for Millet's "Angelus", which he intended to sell for eight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 曾经有人出价四法郎买画作《晚祷》，这幅画米勒原本打算卖八法郎。

sense_info_list.en: a reduction in the usual price of something, usually for a short period
sense_info_list.zh: 减价; 处理价; 特价

examination_example.sentence: She just couldn't stop shopping and she loved special <highlight>offers</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她就是不停地购物，她特别喜欢特价商品。

examination_example.sentence: When he was leaving, the shop keeper suddenly told him that the shop had a special <highlight>offer</highlight> on ears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他离开时, 店主突然告诉他, 店里耳朵有特价。

examination_example.sentence: Last June, she finished China's Gaokao and received an <highlight>offer</highlight> from Sichuan International Study University.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年六月，她完成了中国高考，并收到了来自四川外国语大学的录取通知书。

word_usage.usage:
offer后一般不接that从句。如：
她主动把自行车借给了我。
误 She offered that she would lend me her bike.
正 She offered to lend me her bike.

offer本身已含有“给予，付出”的意思，所以不与give同用。如：
承你的帮忙，不胜感激。
误 We are grateful to you for your offer to give help to us.
正 We are grateful to you for your offer of help to us.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，多指主动提出或提供意见或东西等，但是否接受由对方自行决定。
既可指提出意见建议等，又可指拿出某物供人欣赏或赠送。
